persons.goalDetails: Ever since childhood I wanted to be a Commercial Pilot. In early 20s I started off with my ground training fro the same and cleared the DGCA exams. Now I am lookijg forward to joning a good flying school to attain my CPL.

persons.goalDesc:
I wanna be the CEO of Google one day! I am an ambitious guy with more than 4 years of experience in ed-tech. I have taught more than 4k+ students across diverse verticals. A lot of them are luckily placed in Amazon, Google, Oracle, Adobe, Flipkart! 
My expertise lie in DS and Algorithms, Competitive Coding, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and MERN stack dev!
